channel.title: NPC Drop Rates
channel.description:
So I've been looking to make new items that certain NPC's drop, but I've been getting a bit confused.
When I open up the NPCDrops.TSM file, I get things that look like this:
[code] #torm demon
1155:25 4113:1 4111:1 etc...[/code]
#torm demon
####:##
####= Item ID ##= Drop Rate
But what confuses me is, how can you determine which is higher? The higher the number the more rare, or the lower the number the more rare? How rare is it when ####:1? How can I make it so that the drops that I'm adding in are dropped to a ratio of 1:100?
Thanks,
Anthony

item.title: NPC Drop Rates
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

Idk, Project Insanity has two for some reason… But anyways, how can I get this to drop the items I want?

Read full topic

wait what? you only need one tsm file…

item.title: NPC Drop Rates
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

Alright well I removed all of the previous drops, and added these ones for a test.

I have two NPCDrops.TSM files and I edited them both to the picture above and I’m still getting drops that are completely irrelevant to what I’ve added.

592= Ashes
15006= Vesta’s Long Sword

And I’m getting drops like coins, godsword shards, and whips. How can I fix it so the Tormented Demons drop only the items I’ve added?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Drop Rates
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

higher = rarer. So if id was

2:100 in every 100 kills or so a man would drop a rare.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Drop Rates
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

So I’ve been looking to make new items that certain NPC’s drop, but I’ve been getting a bit confused.

When I open up the NPCDrops.TSM file, I get things that look like this:

[code]
#torm demon

1155:25 4113:1 4111:1 etc…[/code]

#torm demon

####:##

####= Item ID
##= Drop Rate

But what confuses me is, how can you determine which is higher? The higher the number the more rare, or the lower the number the more rare? How rare is it when ####:1? How can I make it so that the drops that I’m adding in are dropped to a ratio of 1:100?

Thanks,

Anthony
